divs: Sighting DetailsLooking north east towards the Sacramento valley, ca. Walking to my car. Saw this object fly at a sharp angle, downward to the horizon in a straight line at a 45 degree angle. The object looked to emit white, bright light with a glowing red tail. I first thought it was a shooting star. The speed was slower then shooting stars I've seen in the past, it also looked to be closer. Because it was closer then a shooting star it looked to be like a very "big" star. Then then I saw it disappear beyond the horizon.
Summary: Glowing white star like object with red tail.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Auburn
There were no other sightings in Auburn on or around October 22nd 2013
